ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for LH Side)

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Place the seat in the cabin.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Fully fold the seat forward and install the seat with the 2 nuts.

atten4.ptxt: Tighten the nuts in the order indicated in the illustration.

s2.ptxt: Fully lock the seat to the vehicle body.
Install the 2 bolts on the front side in the order indicated in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Confirm that the seat is firmly locked to the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Return the seatback to the upright position.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the hinge cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT AND ADJUST SEAT SLIDE ADJUSTER LOCKS

s2.ptxt: During sliding operation of the front seat, check that the left and right adjusters move together smoothly and lock simultaneously.
If the seat adjusters do not lock simultaneously, loosen the seat fixation bolts to adjust the adjuster's position.
